verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> by the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%>

To <S%G5095>Timothy,<s%> my dearly <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5043>son:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace,<s%> <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> and <S%G1515>peace,<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> and <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

I <S%G2192>thank<s%> <S%G5485><s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G3000>serve<s%> from my <S%G4269>forefathers<s%> with <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G4893>conscience,<s%> that <S%G88>without<s%> <S%G83>ceasing<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3417>remembrance<s%> of you in my <S%G1162>prayers<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> and <S%G2250>day;<s%>
<S%G1971>Greatly<s%> <S%G1971>desiring<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> you, being <S%G3403>mindful<s%> of your <S%G1144>tears,<s%> that I may be <S%G4137>filled<s%> with <S%G5479>joy;<s%>

When I <S%G2983>call<s%> to <S%G5280>remembrance<s%> the <S%G505>unfeigned<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> that is in you, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1774>dwelled<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> in your <S%G3125>grandmother<s%> <S%G3090>Lois,<s%> and your <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G2131>Eunice;<s%> and I am <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> that in you <S%G2532>also.<s%>

<S%G1223>Why<s%> <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G363>put<s%> you in <S%G363>remembrance<s%> that you <S%G329>stir<s%> up the <S%G5486>gift<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is in you by the <S%G1936>putting<s%> <S%G1936>on<s%> of my <S%G5495>hands.<s%>
For <S%G2316>God<s%> has not <S%G1325>given<s%> us the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G1167>fear;<s%> but of <S%G1411>power,<s%> and of <S%G26>love,<s%> and of a <S%G4995>sound<s%> <S%G4995>mind.<s%>

Be not you <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> of the <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> of me his <S%G1198>prisoner:<s%> but be you <S%G4777>partaker<s%> of the <S%G4777>afflictions<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>

<S%G3588>Who<s%> has <S%G4982>saved<s%> us, and <S%G2564>called<s%> us with an <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2821>calling,<s%> not <S%G2596>according<s%> to our <S%G2041>works,<s%> but <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4286>purpose<s%> and <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> us in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G166>world<s%> began,

But is <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G5319>made<s%> <S%G5319>manifest<s%> by the <S%G2015>appearing<s%> of our <S%G4990>Savior<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> who has <S%G2673>abolished<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> and has <S%G5461>brought<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> and <S%G861>immortality<s%> to <S%G5461>light<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel:<s%>
<S%G1519>Whereunto<s%> <S%G3739><s%> I am <S%G5087>appointed<s%> a <S%G2783>preacher,<s%> and an <S%G652>apostle,<s%> and a <S%G1320>teacher<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>

For the <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G156>cause<s%> I <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things: <S%G235>nevertheless<s%> I am not <S%G1870>ashamed:<s%> for I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G4100>believed,<s%> and am <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> that he is <S%G1415>able<s%> to <S%G5442>keep<s%> that which I have <S%G3866>committed<s%> to him <S%G1519>against<s%> that <S%G2250>day.<s%>

<S%G2192>Hold<s%> fast the <S%G5296>form<s%> of <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G3056>words,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G191>heard<s%> of me, in <S%G4102>faith<s%> and <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
That <S%G2570>good<s%> thing which was <S%G3872>committed<s%> to you <S%G5442>keep<s%> by the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1774>dwells<s%> in us.

<S%G5124>This<s%> you <S%G1492>know,<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> they which are in <S%G773>Asia<s%> be <S%G654>turned<s%> <S%G654>away<s%> from me; of <S%G3739>whom<s%> are <S%G5436>Phygellus<s%> and <S%G2061>Hermogenes.<s%>

The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> to the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G3683>Onesiphorus;<s%> for he <S%G4178>oft<s%> <S%G404>refreshed<s%> me, and was not <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> of my <S%G254>chain:<s%>
But, when he was in <S%G4516>Rome,<s%> he <S%G2212>sought<s%> me out <S%G4708>very<s%> <S%G4706>diligently,<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> me.

The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>grant<s%> to him that he may <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> in that <S%G2250>day:<s%> and in <S%G3745>how<s%> <S%G3745>many<s%> things he <S%G1247>ministered<s%> to me <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> you <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G957>very<s%> <S%G957>well.<s%>
